column2: "Afei akodzi daa Saul fi na David fi ntamu kyɛree: na David dze
column3: nna dzen ara na ɔyɛ
column4: naaso Saul fi dze gow ara na ɔgow."

column2: "Na David woo mbabanyin wɔ Hebron: na n’abakan nye Ammon a ɔnye Jezreelnyi Ahinoam woo no no;"
"na nyia otsia ebien nye Kileab a ɔnye Abigail
column3: Karmelnyi Nabal no kunafo no woo no no; na nyia otsia ebiasa nye Absalom
column4: Gesurhen Talmai ne babaa Maaka ba no;"

column2: "na nyia otsia anan nye Adonija
column3: Hagit ba no; na nyia otsia enum nye Sefatia

column2: "na nyia otsia esia nye Itream a David ne yer Egla woo no no. Woyinom na wɔwoo hɔn maa David wɔ Hebron."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a akodzi daa Saul fi na David fi ntamu no
column4: Abner na ɔyɛɛ no ho katabann wɔ Saul fi no mu."

column2: "Afei Saul wɔ nwewe bi a ne dzin dze Rizpa
column3: Aia ne babaa a
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na akɔ m’egya no nwewe nkyɛn?"

column2: "Nna Abner no bo fuuw dodoodow wɔ Is-boset ne nsɛm no ntsi
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ana metse dɛ ɔkraman bi a ɔka Judafo do ara a? Ndɛ da yi na mekyerɛ ayamuyie ma w’egya fie
column6: na minnyii wo mennhyɛɛ David nsa
column7: nna ɔwo edze bɔn roto mo do ndɛ da yi wɔ ɔbaa yi ho yi?"

column2: "Nyankopɔn nyɛ Abner dɛm
column3: na dza ɔnnto nyimpa no nnto no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka ntam akyerɛ David no
column6: mannyɛ dɛmara so amma no a;"

column2: "dɛ wɔbɛdan ahendzi no efi Saul fie
column3: na wɔdze David ahengua no esi Israel na Juda do

column2: "Na Is-boset enntum emmbua Abner asɛm bi bio
column3: osiandɛ osuroo no."

column2: "Na Abner somaa abɔfo wɔ n’afamu ma wɔkɔr David nkyɛn dɛ
column3: Woana na asaase yi dzi wɔ no? Afei enye me nkyekyer
column6: mobɔboa wo ma aadan Israel nyinara aba wo nkyɛn."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Oye; menye wo bɛkyekyer: na mbom adze kor na morohwehwɛ no wo hɔ
column6: gyedɛ idzi kan dze Saul ne babaa Mikal ba ana

column2: "Na David somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Saul ba Is-boset hɔ dɛ
column3: Fa me yer Mikal a medze Filistiafo hɔn mbarimba anower ɔha megyee no ayewar no brɛ me."

column2: "Na Is-boset somae ma wɔkɛfaa no wɔ no kun no nkyɛn
column3: mekyerɛ Lais ba Paltiel a."

column2: "Na no kun no nye no kɔree
column3: mbrɛ ɔrokɔ no nna orusu
column4: na odzii n’ekyir ara kodur Bahurim. Nna Abner see no dɛ

column2: "Na Abner nye Israel mpanyimfo no twetwee nkɔmbɔ dɛ
column3: Mber bi a abɛsen hom hwehwɛɛ David dɛ nkyɛ ombedzi hom do hen:"

column2: "na afei hom nyɛ ɛ: osiandɛ EWURADZE aka no David ho dɛ
column3: M’akowaa David nsa do na menam mebɛgye me man Israel wɔ Filistiafo nsamu

column2: "Na Abner kasaa so kyerɛɛ Benjamin: na Abner kɔree so dɛ ɔrekɛka dza ɔhwɛ a oye biara dze ma Israel
column3: na Benjamin fidua nyina

column2: "Nna Abner baa David nkyɛn wɔ Hebron
column3: na mbarimba eduonu ka no ho. Na David too Abner na mbarimba a wɔka no ho no pon."

column2: "Na Abner see David dɛ
column3: Mobɔsoɛr na makɔ
column4: na makɔboaboa Israel nyinara ano abrɛ mo wura ɔhen
column6: ma edzi hen wɔ dza wo kra pɛ nyinara do. Na David gyaa Abner kwan; na ɔkɔr no asomdwee mu."

column2: "Ɔkɔree ara
column3: nna David no dɔm no na Joab fi kwan do bae
column4: na wɔdze ndzɛmba a wɔkɔfomee kɛsenara bae: nna Abner nnyi David nkyɛn wɔ Hebron; osiandɛ oegya no kwan

column2: "Aber a Joab na dɔm a wɔka no ho no nyinara bae no
column3: wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Joab

column2: "Nna Joab kɔr ɔhen no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Abner aba wo nkyɛn a; ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na egya no kwan ma ɔkɔ koraa yi?"

column2: "Woara nyim Abner
column3: Ner ba no dɛ ɔbae bɛdaadaa wo
column4: na oehu wo nkɔree na wo mbae

column2: "Na aber a Joab fi David nkyɛn puei no
column3: ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wotsiiw Abner
column4: na wɔdze no fi Sira bura ho sanee bae: nna David dze

column2: "Na aber a Abner sanee baa Hebron no
column3: Joab faa no faa nkyɛn kɔr kuropon no mu dɛ ɔnye no rukotu egyina
column4: na ɔdze nkantsee wɔɔ ne yafun mu wɔ hɔ ma owui
column5: wɔ no nua Asahel no bɔgyaa no ntsi."

column2: "Na n’ekyir no a David tsee no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Emi na m’ahenman yenndzi fɔ wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa wɔ Abner

column2: "wɔmma ongu Joab n’etsifi
column3: na n’egya fie nyinara do; na mma nyia ɔwɔ ahosen
column7: anaa edziban abɔ no mmpa Joab fie ara da."

column2: "Yehu dɛ
column3: Joab na no nua Abishai kum Abner
column4: osiandɛ okum hɔn nua Asahel wɔ ɔko no mu wɔ Gibeon."

column2: "Na David see Joab
column3: na dɔm no a wɔka no ho no nyinara dɛ
column5: na hom mfa eyitam mbobɔ hom asen do
column6: na wontwa kwadwom ndzi Abner n’enyim. Na ɔhen David dzii ifun bonto no ekyir."

column2: "Na wosiee Abner wɔ Hebron: na ɔhen no maa ne ndze do sui wɔ Abner nda do; na ɔman no nyinara sui."
"Na ɔhen no twaa Abner ho kwadwom see dɛ
column3: Aso Abner ewu dɛ mbrɛ ɔkwasea wu?"

column2: "Wɔannkyekyer wo nsa
column3: na wɔannto w’anan mpokyerɛ so: Dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa tɔr emumuyɛfo mba enyim no
column4: dɛmara so na atɔr yi. Na ɔman no nyinara suu no bio."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara baa dɛ wɔrebɛyɛ David ma oedzi edziban bi wɔ mber a ewia da ho wɔ do no; na David kaa ntam
column3: dɛ
column5: na dza ɔnnto nyimpa no nto me

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara hyɛɛ no nsew
column3: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn enyisɔ: dɛ adze biara a ɔhen no yɛe no ɔyɛɛ ɔman no nyinara enyisɔ no."

column2: "Nna ɔman no nyinara na Israel nyinara tsee ase da no dɛ ommfir ɔhen no na wokum Abner
column3: Ner ba no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see no nkowaa dɛ
column3: Ana hom nnyim dɛ ɔsafohen na nyimpa kɛse atɔr ndɛ da yi wɔ Israel?"

column2: "Na ndɛ da yi mayɛ mberɛw
column3: kaansa wɔasera me ahyɛ me hen mpo a; na mbarimba yi
column5: wɔyɛ dzen dodow ma me: EWURADZE ntua ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi kaw dɛ mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛbɔn tse."
